price: انسان په هغه شان بدي غواړي څرنګه چې د خير غوښتل یې دي، انسان ډېر تلوار كوونكى دى.
arabic: وَيَدۡعُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلۡخَيۡرِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wayadʿu al-insānu bil-shari duʿāahu bil-khayri wakāna al-insānu ʿajūlan
